entry.title: As The Healer Heal…..But Who Will Heal The Healer?
entry.summary:
Author: Jasontodd7Redh00d

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,829Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 3

Summary: They called it a gift. A miracle. But no one asked what it took from me. I healed them all — took their pain, their wounds, their suffering. But I couldn’t save the ones I loved most.If I had known it would end like this, I never would’ve touched them. Never would’ve hoped.Now they’re gone.And all I have left…is the guilt.
